briefTitle: Harmonizing Outcomes With Revascularization and Stents in Acute Myocardial Infarction

outcomeMeasures.title: Pharmacology Arm - Major Adverse Ischemic Cardiac Events and Major Bleeding Events
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with major adverse cardiovascular events (death, reinfarction, target-vessel revascularization for ischemia, and stroke) and major bleeding (bleeding adjudicated as not related to coronary artery bypass grafting).

outcomeMeasures.title: Stent Arm - Ischemic Target Lesion Revascularization
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Participants With Ischemic Target Lesion Revascularization

outcomeMeasures.title: Stent Arm - Death, Reinfarction, Stroke, or Stent Thrombosis
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Participants With Death, Reinfarction, Stroke, or Stent Thrombosis

outcomeMeasures.title: Pharmacology Arm - Major Adverse Cardiovascular Events
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with major adverse cardiovascular events (death, reinfarction, target-vessel revascularization for ischemia, and stroke)

outcomeMeasures.title: Pharmacology Arm - Non-Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting-Related Major Bleeding
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with major bleeding (bleeding adjudicated as not related to coronary artery bypass grafting)

outcomeMeasures.title: Stent Arm - Segment Binary Angiographic Restenosis
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Participants With Segment Binary Angiographic Restenosis (13-month Angiographic Subset).

outcomeMeasures.title: Pharmacology Arm - Major Adverse Cardiovascular Events
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with major adverse cardiovascular events (death, reinfarction, target-vessel revascularization for ischemia, and stroke)
